hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Double Defense#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a small #Fairy Fountain#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^${12 48 31}Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.
